thread.title: Great Place Great stay
thread.title_full: Great Place Great stay - Review of Comfotel Prpl, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Edward D
title: Great Place Great stay
text: I stayed here for 3 nights and was my first time in London. I was looking for something close to the bus and train stations with shops and restaurant close by. I must the hotel met all my expectations. The hotel was fairly cheap with all the required amenities including wifi and breakfast
